backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing authorization, user profile storage, and full CRUD for categories with admin checks and ordering operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to a new state shape by adding an empty storeDetails map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for multiple frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes the TanStack Router and renders the ToastViewport for global toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Admin access‑denied page showing the user's principal and allowing logout via Internet Identity and auth store reset.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHeade: Header bar with sidebar toggle, brand link, and logout logic clearing auth and navigation state.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Login panel UI using Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSideb: Admin navigation sidebar with mobile overlay and active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVerif: Centered loading screen displayed while verifying admin permissions.
frontend/src/components/admin/CopyIconBu: Icon button that copies a provided string to the clipboard with success indication.
frontend/src/components/admin/DashboardN: Clickable dashboard card that navigates to a specified admin path with icon and title.
frontend/src/components/admin/products/C: Category filter select component using SafeSelect with sentinel values and category query.
frontend/src/components/admin/products/D: Confirmation dialog requiring a password to delete a product via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/products/P: Pagination controls with page size selection and numbered navigation for product lists.
Renders a table of products with copy, edit, delete, and in‑stock toggle actions, handling loading and empty states.
Modal for creating or editing products with form handling, validation, image upload, and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/sales/Dele: Confirmation dialog to delete a sale item, calling a delete mutation and handling pending state.
frontend/src/components/admin/sales/Sale: Dialog asking for confirmation before deactivating a sale item, triggering a provided callback.
Displays sale items as cards with thumbnails, pricing, status, and controls for edit, delete, and active toggling.
Provides UI controls to filter sale items by status and date range.
Pagination controls with page navigation, size selection, and range display for sale item lists.
Renders a table of sale items with thumbnail loading, activation toggling, edit/delete actions, and a deactivation confirmation dialog.
Displays a visual status badge for a sale item based on its computed status.
Modal for creating or editing sale items with product search, form state, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/sales/useP: Fetches a product photo via actor API, returning a blob URL or placeholder with caching via React Query.
frontend/src/components/admin/store-deta: Buttons for saving or restoring store details, showing disabled and loading states.
Form for editing store details including name, contact info, address, description, and hours with validation handling.
Displays a formatted preview of store details including contact info and hours.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Dropdown component that loads categories from backend and displays them with loading and empty states.
Empty test file placeholder for SafeSelect component tests.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Safe wrapper around shadcn Select enforcing non‑empty values using sentinel values and conversion helpers.
A toast notification card with timed auto-dismiss, pause-on-hover, animations, and type-specific icons.
frontend/src/components/toast/ToastViewp: Container rendering all active toasts from the toast store.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, auto-reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity changes.
Verifies admin permissions using the actor, updating auth state and handling errors with toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCategoryOptions.ts: Loads all categories and maps them into dropdown-ready option objects with loading and empty-state info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating product data, converting backend bigint fields to UI-friendly numbers.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductSearchForSa: Implements a debounced product search hook for sales creation, converting backend results and filtering out items without prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for category CRUD operations, converting backend bigints and managing category cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAdminNaviga: Redirects non-admin authenticated users away from protected routes and exposes access and verification status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaleItemQueries.ts: Provides hooks for querying and mutating sale items, including status/date filtering and bigint-to-number conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoreDetailsQuerie: Implements hooks to fetch and update store details, converting between backend formats, parsing coordinates and store hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncAuthFromIntern: Syncs the principal from Internet Identity into the app's auth store whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme color variables, and includes custom toast notification styles.
frontend/src/layouts/admin/DashboardLayo: Provides the admin dashboard layout with header, sidebar toggle, and main content wrapper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoute.tsx: Handles admin authentication, identity sync, admin verification, and wraps protected routes in the dashboard layout.
Implements category management with search, CRUD modals, validation, and table display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DashboardHomePa: Shows admin dashboard overview with navigation cards linking to management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ExportPage.tsx: Displays a simple placeholder page for future data export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/OnSaleProductsP: Manages on-sale products with search, filters, pagination, and create/edit/delete modals.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ProductsPage.ts: Manages products with search, category filtering, pagination, and CRUD modals.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StoreDetailsPag: Admin page that loads, edits, validates, and saves details for two stores using tabs and form state management.
frontend/src/router.tsx: Defines the TanStack router tree for admin pages including products, categories, store details, and export.
frontend/src/stores/authStore.ts: Zustand store managing authentication state, admin status checks, and persistence.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for creating, storing, and clearing toast notifications with helper methods.
frontend/src/utils/adminDate.ts: Converts between date strings and nanosecond timestamps and validates date ranges for admin forms.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.te: Empty test placeholder for API response handler.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Standardizes API response parsing with BigInt support and provides ApiError handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.test: Empty test placeholder for BigInt serializer.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: Provides safe BigInt/string conversions and a JSON parser that auto-converts timestamp-related fields.
frontend/src/utils/categoryNumeric.ts: Provides safe conversions between UI numbers and bigint values for category IDs, order, and reorder arrays.
frontend/src/utils/imageWebp.ts: Provides image validation, WebP conversion, blob URL creation, and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.test: Empty test placeholder for numeric conversion utilities.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Utility for safely converting numbers, validating IVA and margins, handling stock booleans, and formatting prices.
Logs detailed errors and shows toast notifications for errors, warnings, successes, and info messages.
frontend/src/utils/storeDetailsValidatio: Validates store details fields including email, phone, coordinates, and required text fields.
frontend/src/utils/storeHoursFormat.ts: Formats store hours into display-friendly lists and provides Spanish day labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and cleanup for both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes overall project configuration, architecture, requirements, and known issues.
